mapper.select: select ifnull(count(*),0) from board where boardid = #{boardid}
select * from board where boardid = #{boardid} order by ref desc, re_step limit #{startRow} , #{endRow}
mapper.update: update board set re_step = re_step+1 where ref = #{ref} and re_step > #{re_step}
update board set readcount=readcount + 1 where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select passwd from board where num = #{num}
mapper.update: update board set writer=#{writer},email=#{email} ,subject=#{subject},passwd=#{passwd},content=#{content} where num=#{num}
